The entire Fortran program would be:

program main
    implicit none
    character(len=100) :: str
    integer(kind=8) :: k
    character :: char_out
    integer :: second_out, tmp, i, oddCount
    character(len=20) :: second_str
    integer, dimension(0:9) :: counts =0
    character(len=6) :: third_out

    ! Read input
    read(*,*) str, k

    ! First step
    char_out = '1'
    do i =1, k
        if (str(i:i) /= '1') then
            char_out = str(i:i)
            exit
        end if
    end do

    ! Second step
    second_out =0
    tmp =0
    do i =1, 1 ! since char_out is length 1
        select case (char_out)
        case ('A')
            tmp = tmp +1
        case ('D')
            second_out = second_out + tmp
        case default
            tmp =0
        end select
    end do

    ! Third step
    write(second_str, '(i0)') second_out
    counts =0
    do i =1, len_trim(second_str)
        integer :: c = ichar(second_str(i:i)) - ichar('0')
        counts(c) = counts(c) +1
    end do

    oddCount =0
    do i=0,9
        if (mod(counts(i),2) /=0) then
            oddCount = oddCount +1
        end if
    end do

    if ( (oddCount <=1) .or. (mod(oddCount,2) /=0) ) then
        third_out = "First"
    else
        third_out = "Second"
    end if

    ! Output
    print *, trim(third_out)

end program main
